meets_user_needs.title: As a blind person, I need to apply for the specific allowances, grants and discounts I'm entitled to as a blind person, so that I don't miss out on financial or other benefits I'm entitled to (102374)

details.benefit: I don't miss out on financial or other benefits I'm entitled to
details.goal: apply for the specific allowances, grants and discounts I'm entitled to as a blind person
details.impact: Noticed only by an expert audience
justifications: It's inherent to a person's or an organisation's rights and obligations

meets_user_needs.title: As a disabled person seeking or in work, I need to get the grants, training, advice or other support appropriate for my needs, so that I can get work, travel to work, carry out my work and keep my job (102651)

details.benefit: I can get work, travel to work, carry out my work and keep my job
details.goal: get the grants, training, advice or other support appropriate for my needs
justifications: The government is legally obliged to provide it
It's inherent to a person's or an organisation's rights and obligations
There is clear demand for it from users
It's something the government provides/does/pays for
met_when: Understands when mental health condition becomes a disability
Understands eligibility criteria for various grants
Understands disabled person's rights at work
details.role: disabled person seeking or in work
